channel.title: Miscellaneous :: Shuojiang
channel.description: This folder includes basic information about myself (still under construction). Memorable Moments Quick Facts about Shuojiang Liu

item.title: Memorable Moments
item.description: Notice The following content documents noteworthy records about my personal life. August 19th, 2023 After about 23 hours of total flight time, I arrived in Atlanta on Qatar Airways. July 1st, 2023 🎇🎇🎇 I got the Bachelor of Engineering (Qian Xuesen Honors Engineering Program) degree! June 9th, 2023 I participated in the undergraduate graduation defense and was unanimously approved by all professors. April 4th, 2023 I accepted the offer of Georgia Tech graduate program!

item.title: Quick Facts about Shuojiang Liu
item.description: The following informal content can help you quickly understand Shuojiang Liu 👋👋👋 Before viewing… The information provided below is highly subjective and presented in an unprofessional manner, and the presentation itself is not yet rigorous. Life 🧩 Expand to view… He is a lifelong nonsmoker. He never consumes alcohol and disapproves of “drinking table culture.” He rarely drinks coffee. He seldom ever updates any changes to either his QQ Space or WeChat Moments. He speaks Mandarin and English fluently and is currently planning to learn Japanese. Entertainment and Hobbies ✨ Expand to view… He abhors entertainment that is hypocritical. Lu Xun and Dostoyevsky are his favorite authors. He enjoys watching 2D animation, and his favorite animation studio is GAINAX. His favorite animation directors are Yuasa Masaaki and Tsurumaki Kazuya, and his favorite original artist is Yoshinari Yoshi.
